comments.text:
Back in 2006 I was living in this village for a year and always used to take a ride to Tegucigalpa which takes about an hour to go. No longer than 10min. waiting maximum, no matter if alone or with someone else. Never had any problems with the driver yet an open eye should always be kept.

Cuando vivia en 2006 en este pueblo siempre me fui en autostop a Tegucigalpa que esta una hora para ir. Nunca me quedaron mas que 10 minutos para esperar ahi. No tenia ningunos problemas con los conductores, a
Easy to catch a ride into La Ceiba - basically every car is a pick up, the first that passed picked us up
Good place to hichhike to PANACAM or to the highway
